statements: SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData LIMIT 10
SELECT building_id, system_type, performance_value FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData WHERE system_id = 3
SELECT system_id, performance_metric FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData WHERE performance_value > 1000
SELECT building_id, performance_metric, timestamp FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData WHERE system_type = 'HVAC' ORDER BY performance_value DESC
SELECT building_id, performance_metric, timestamp FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData WHERE system_id = 3 AND performance_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT system_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData WHERE building_id = 5 AND system_type = 'Lighting' ORDER BY performance_value ASC
SELECT system_type, AVG(performance_value) AS avg_performance FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData GROUP BY system_type HAVING avg_performance > 50 ORDER BY avg_performance DESC
SELECT system_type, performance_metric, timestamp FROM GreenBuildingPerformanceData WHERE performance_metric LIKE '%efficiency%' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySystem;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM RenewableEnergySystem;
SELECT system_name, performance_metric, performance_value FROM RenewableEnergySystem JOIN PerformanceData ON RenewableEnergySystem.system_id = PerformanceData.system_id;
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM RenewableEnergySystem WHERE building_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySystem WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM RenewableEnergySystem WHERE building_id = 5;
SELECT system_id, system_name, installation_date FROM RenewableEnergySystem ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE performance_metric = 'efficiency' AND performance_value > 90;
SELECT system_id, AVG(performance_value) AS average_performance FROM PerformanceData GROUP BY system_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergySystems;
SELECT system_name, capacity FROM EnergySystems WHERE efficiency > 0.9;
SELECT building_name FROM EnergySystems ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT id, system_name, capacity, efficiency FROM EnergySystems WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY efficiency ASC;
SELECT system_id, date, power_output FROM PerformanceData WHERE power_output > 500 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergySystems ORDER BY system_name DESC, capacity ASC;
SELECT system_name, building_name, efficiency FROM EnergySystems WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT system_name, building_name, capacity, efficiency FROM EnergySystems WHERE efficiency < 0.8 AND capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT system_id, date, power_output FROM PerformanceData WHERE power_output > 500 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT system_id, log_timestamp, message FROM MonitoringLogs WHERE system_id = 3 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Performance_Data;
SELECT building_id, power_output FROM Performance_Data WHERE power_output > 1000;
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_capacity FROM Systems WHERE system_capacity < 100 ORDER BY system_capacity ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM Buildings;
SELECT system_name, system_capacity FROM Systems WHERE system_capacity > 1000;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Performance_Data WHERE power_output > 5000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT building_name, system_name, power_output FROM Buildings JOIN Systems ON Buildings.building_id = Systems.system_id JOIN Performance_Data ON Buildings.building_id = Performance_Data.building_id;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuilding;
SELECT building_name, location FROM GreenBuilding WHERE energy_system = 'Solar';
SELECT system_name, system_type, efficiency FROM EnergySystem ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE energy_generated > 5000 AND energy_consumed < 2000;
SELECT date, issue_description, resolution_description FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE system_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC, log_id ASC;
SELECT building_id, building_name, location FROM GreenBuilding
SELECT * FROM EnergySystem WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY system_name DESC
SELECT system_name, system_type, efficiency FROM EnergySystem WHERE system_type = 'Solar' AND efficiency > 0.85
SELECT log_id, system_id, issue_description, resolution_description FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE DATE(date) = '2022-01-15'
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS year, SUM(energy_generated) AS total_energy FROM PerformanceData GROUP BY year ORDER BY total_energy DESC
